text:
[Verse]
Golden light on the horizon
Colors blend without a reason
Dancing shadows on the sand
Holding tight we'll make a stand

[Verse 2]
Waves are crashing in a rhythm
Hearts beat fast like racing visions
Whispers float upon the breeze
In this moment feeling free

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams in our eyes
Paint the sky with our sighs
Neon nights and city lights
We chase the stars through summer nights

[Verse 3]
Footprints fade into the twilight
Memories shine in the starlight
Nothing more that we could need
Just you and I beneath the trees

[Bridge]
Time stands still in your laughter
Every moment we're after
Echoes of our secret tune
Our hearts in perfect pneumatic tune

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams in our eyes
Paint the sky with our sighs
Neon nights and city lights
We chase the stars through summer nights
title: Sunset Dreams
